content: Before we begin, we'd like to remind you that the comments made during this conference call by management may contain forward-looking statements under the provisions of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, including statements of expectations or assumptions about Cavco's financial and operational performance, revenues, earnings per share, cash flow or use, cost savings, operational efficiencies, current or future volatility in the credit markets or future market conditions. Net revenue for the period was $588.3 million, 78.1% compared to $330.4 million during the past fiscal year's first quarter. Within the factory built housing segment, net revenue increased 83.4% to $572.6 million from $312.3 million in the prior year first quarter. Selling, general, and administrative expense in the first quarter of fiscal 2023 was $66.1 million or 11.2% of net revenue compared to $40.8 million or 12.4% of net revenue during the same quarter last year.
